changeSet.comment: Add workflow options attributes to existing workflow types
changeSet.sql: ALTER TYPE AllOfUsArrays ADD ATTRIBUTE workflow_options text CASCADE -- workflow options to be passed to Cromwell
ALTER TYPE copyfile ADD ATTRIBUTE workflow_options text CASCADE -- workflow options to be passed to Cromwell
ALTER TYPE ExternalWholeGenomeReprocessing ADD ATTRIBUTE workflow_options text CASCADE -- workflow options to be passed to Cromwell
ALTER TYPE ExternalExomeReprocessing ADD ATTRIBUTE workflow_options text CASCADE -- workflow options to be passed to Cromwell
changeSet.comment: Add workflow options column to overall workload table
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE workload ADD workflow_options text
